name: You Better Run (itch)
description:
If you find the room with gold you win.

You have a Fairy pet wich stuns enemys if its near them.

The Red Balls are Lever wich open doors

Some of them can only be activatet if the Fairy is near them.

Controls :

WASD - Movement

Mouse - StunFairy

Left Click : Flashlight on/off

This game isnt Finished yet, maybe there will be updates coming in the future.

Createt With Free Assets
KUNNIKI - Lowpoly Dungeon Assets - Unity Asset Store
